articles.title: India's Fully Robotic Telescope In Ladakh Captures Building-Sized Asteroid's Closest Approach To Earth - NDTV
articles.description: The GROWTH-India telescope at the Indian Astronomical Observatory in Ladakh recently captured a building-sized asteroid on its approach to Earth.
articles.content:
GROWTH-India Telescope is India's first fully robotic optical research telescope.
